movies.title: OBLIVION (2012)
movies.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity...

movies.title: into the wild (2014)
movies.stars: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson
movies.description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat...

movies.title: BLADE RUNNER (2015)
movies.description: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help...

movies.title: MULHOLLAND PRIDE (2013)
movies.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Guy Pearce,Don Cheadle
movies.description: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
